tool_description: The Gmail Address Validation and Profile Picture Retrieval API is an advanced solution that not only verifies the accuracy of Gmail addresses but also retrieves the user's profile picture associated with the provided Gmail address. This versatile service seamlessly integrates into your applications or systems, offering real-time validation of Gmail addresses and fetching the associated profile pictures to enhance user experiences.
name: Gmail Checker
title: Gmail Checker

api_list.name: Gmail Check
api_list.description: Check if the Gmail address is valid.
